meanings.sent1: The superpersonal force of nature guided the storm.
meanings.sent2: The concept of superpersonal power is intriguing.
meanings.sent3: The superpersonal weather seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her superpersonal aura commanded attention wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The superpersonal deity watched over the land with a silent presence.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring beyond the personal realm.
meanings.sent1: The superpersonal realm of dreams fascinated him.
meanings.sent2: The idea of superpersonal beings intrigued the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The superpersonal stars whispered secrets to the night sky.
meanings.sent4: His superpersonal ambitions reached beyond the ordinary.
meanings.sent5: The superpersonal universe expanded infinitely in all directions.
